thread.title: Hundreds of people gather in Bristol for an anti Trump rally
thread.title_full: Hundreds of people gather in Bristol for an anti Trump rally | West Country - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Hundreds of people gather in Bristol for an anti Trump rally
text:
Credit: ITV West Country Nearly five hundred people gathered in central Bristol this afternoon to protest against US President Donald Trump.
The protest was organised in response to the White House's ban on immigration from certain Muslim countries.
Young and old are involved in today's gathering in the city centre.
One of the youngest at today's march Credit: ITV News Organisers also demanded that Theresa May cancel her invitation to Mr Trump to come on a state visit to the UK later this year.
Sorry, this content isn't available on your device.
RELATED: Trump travel ban temporarily suspended by US judge Some of the messages people are carrying today Credit: ITV News The rally in the city centre has been organised to coincide with another march through London today.
